Description: This is an invisible entity which will block all monsters who have the "MonsterClip"-spawnflag enabled. Starts enabled, but can be toggled on and off by trigger. To make func_monsterclip disabled at start use [trigger_auto](../trigger_auto).

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can trigger it to enable or disable monster clipping. Depending on trigger use-type: 'On'- enable clip, 'Toggle'- toggle clip, 'Off'- disable clip. Can be kill-targeted.
